Function: Electrical Resistor for dissipating power in over voltage situations
Failure Mode: Open circuit occurs in resistor under load
Failure Effects (Local, WEC, System): Overvoltage from loss of emergency resistor could damage Electrical Insulation, and result in shorts or open circuits in other components, loss of PTO damping may lead to structural fatigue
Failure Cause(s): Failure due to Corrosion, Inproper Mounting, Vibration, overheating, or over-current
Risk Reduction Design: Marine-rated resistor module, design to provide sufficient cooling and vibration damping
Preventative Detection: SCADA - temperature, vibration, and current monitoring
Post Failure Detection: SCADA - PTO controller error diagnostics, physical inspection/test
Post Failure Repair Strategy (automated: In-Situ Inspection, Repair or Replacement of faulty component
